pages.text: If you're playing with friends, please take a moment to synchronize your progress with eachother.$(br2)$(l)/tofe help$()$(br)Use this command to learn how to create and manage your team.

$(bold)BE WARNED:$()There are endless changes made to the mechanics throughout the entire game.$(br)  If you get confused or frustrated, browse this book to find information on the challenges you're facing.
